intro: Match Fruits to create bigger fruits. Hours of fun and challenge your friends for the highest score on global leaderboards!
description:
Big Watermelon Match presents a NEW puzzling challenge, where players, stack various fruits in a confined space to earn points without letting any fruit breach the top boundary. To prevent overflow, players must strategically merge fruits of the same type, gradually increasing their size and score, culminating in the coveted watermelon merger. 

Featuring eleven fruits ranging from cherry to watermelon, the game follows a specific size progression, limiting players to dropping only the five smallest fruits at any given time. Although the order of available fruits is random, players can anticipate the next fruit in line.

The game also incorporates an online leaderboard for players to compare their scores based on Seasons, with the option to track personal progress and view the full leaderboard rankings.  Can you master the art of fruit pairing and reach the top of the leaderboard?

Game modes:
(a) Classic - watermelon game rule.
(b) Classic Time Attack - 300 seconds.
(c) Arcade - new feature, swap fruits and random bomb drops.
(d) Arcade Time Attack - 300 seconds.

Hours of fun and challenge your friends for the highest score on global leaderboards!
